tool.name: Nucmer
tool.command: #set $query=""+"".join(str($query_sequence).split(','))+"" nucmer $anchoring -b '$breaklen' -c '$mincluster' -D '$diagdiff' -d '$diagfactor' $noextend $direction -g '$maxgap' -l '$minmatch' -L '$minalign' $nooptimize $nosimplify --threads "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" #if $options.advanced == 'enable': $options.banded $options.large $options.genome -M '$options.max_chunk' #end if '$reference_sequence' '$query' #if $mumplot.plot == 'yes': && mummerplot #if $mumplot.sequences.seq_input == 'yes': -R '$reference_sequence' -Q '$query' $mumplot.sequences.layout #end if -b '$mumplot.breaklen' $mumplot.color $mumplot.filter $mumplot.fat #if $mumplot.labels.IDs == 'yes': -IdR '$mumplot.labels.ref_id' -IdQ '$mumplot.labels.query_id' #end if -s '$mumplot.size' -terminal png -title '$mumplot.title' $mumplot.snp #if $mumplot.range.custom == 'yes': -x [$mumplot.range.min_x:$mumplot.range.max_x] -y [$mumplot.range.min_y:$mumplot.range.max_y] #end if 'out.delta' #end if

param.name: breaklen
param.label: Break Length
param.help: Set the distance an alignment extension will attempt to extend poor scoring regions before giving up

param.name: mincluster
param.label: Minumum Cluster Length
param.help: Sets the minimum length of a cluster of matches

param.name: diagdiff
param.label: Maximum Diagonal Difference
param.help: Set the maximum diagonal difference between two adjacent anchors in a cluster

param.name: diagfactor
param.label: Maximum Diagonal Difference as Fraction
param.help: Set the maximum diagonal difference between two adjacent anchors in a cluster as a differential fraction of the gap length

param.name: noextend
param.label: No Extend
param.help: Do not perform cluster extension step

param.name: direction
param.label: Direction of Query Sequence to Use
param.option: Use only forward sequence of query
Use only reverese sequence of query

param.name: maxgap
param.label: Maximum Gap Distance
param.help: Set the maximum gap between two adjacent matches in a cluster

param.name: minmatch
param.label: Minimum Match Length
param.help: Set the minimum length of a single exact match

param.name: minalign
param.label: Minumum Alignment Length
param.help: Minimum length of an alignment, after clustering and extension

param.name: nooptimize
param.label: Alignment Score Optimization
param.help: No alignment score optimization, i.e. if an alignment extension reaches the end of a sequence, it will not backtrack to optimize the alignment score and instead terminate the alignment at the end of the sequence

param.name: nosimplify
param.label: Simplify Alignments
param.help: Don't simplify alignments by removing shadowed clusters. Use this option when aligning a sequence to itself to look for repeats

param.name: banded
param.label: Banding
param.help: Enforce absolute banding of dynamic programming matrix based on diagdiff parameter

param.name: large
param.label: Force the use of large offsets

param.name: max_chunk
param.label: Max Chunk
param.help: Stop adding sequence for a thread if more than MAX already.

param.name: plot
param.label: Do you want to output a 2-D dotplot of the input sequences?

param.name: seq_input
param.label: Plot an ordered set of reference/query sequences?

param.name: layout
param.label: Layout a .delta multiplot in an intelligible fashion

param.name: breaklen
param.label: Break Length
param.help: Highlight alignments with breakpoints further than breaklen nucleotides from the nearest sequence end

param.name: color
param.label: Color plot lines with a percent similarity gradient or turn off all plot color

param.name: coverage
param.label: Generate a reference coverage plot (default for .tiling) or the defualt dotplot

param.name: filter
param.label: Filter alignments
param.help: Only display .delta alignments which represent the 'best' hit to any particular spot on either sequence, i.e. a one-to-one mapping of reference and query subsequences

param.name: fat
param.label: Layout sequences using fattest alignment only

param.name: IDs
param.label: Plot a particular reference or query sequence?
param.help: For alignments that used more than one reference/query

param.name: size
param.label: Set the output size to small, medium or large

param.name: snp
param.label: Highlight SNP locations in each alignment

param.name: custom
param.label: Choose custom X and Y axis ranges?

tool.help: Combination tool of nucmer and mummerplot.
